sentences.en: 'Is, I assure you,'said the spy;'though it's not important.'
sentences.cn: “ 的确是, 我向你保证, ” 密探说, “ 虽然这并不重要. ”

sentences.en: And let me assure you I will use whatever force is necessary to restore order.
sentences.cn: 我向你保证，我将动用一切必要力量来恢复秩序。

sentences.en: He hastened to assure us that the press would not be informed.
sentences.cn: 他急忙向我们保证新闻界是不会知道的.

sentences.en: I assure you I am quite sane.
sentences.cn: 我向大家保证,我的脑筋很健全.

sentences.en: I assure you that she can be trusted to do the job.
sentences.cn: 我担保她能做好这项工作.

sentences.en: I can assure you that the animals are well cared for.
sentences.cn: 我可以向你保证动物们得到了精心照顾。

sentences.en: I can certainly assure you I'm looking after number one all right.
sentences.cn: 我可以肯定地向你保证,我会照顾好自己的.

sentences.en: Let me assure you that it was not intentional.
sentences.cn: 我向你保证那不是故意的.

sentences.en: Moreover, he wanted to assure himself that Huck had remained discreet.
sentences.cn: 而且, 他想搞清楚,哈克是否始终没把这个秘密泄露出去.

sentences.en: Mr Brownson, I assure you King's an old enemy of mine.
sentences.cn: 布朗森先生，我向你保证金是我的老冤家。

sentences.en: The document is genuine, I can assure you .
sentences.cn: 我能向你保证，这文件是真的。

sentences.en: The only ladder to assure success is to work hard.
sentences.cn: 确保成功的惟一途径是刻苦努力.

sentences.en: This may sound trivial, but I assure you it is quite important!
sentences.cn: 这听上去也许微不足道，但是，相信我，它十分重要！

sentences.en: You think you are clever; on the contrary, I assure that you are very foolish.
sentences.cn: 你自以为很聪明, 相反地, 我确信你很傻.

sentences.en: You will have a bad quarter of an hour of it, I assure you.
sentences.cn: 我敢保证, 你准得受一刻钟的罪.

sentences.en: You'll like it; I assure you.

words.tran_cn: 保证的；确信的；使人有信心的

phrases.tran_cn: vt. 向...保证）；查明（使相信

trans.tran_en: to tell someone that something will definitely happen or is definitely true so that they are less worried

trans.tran_cn: 使确信； 确保， 向…保证
trans.tran_en: to tell someone that something will definitely happen or is definitely true so that they are less worried
